Package model.card

Interface Hand

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    HandImpl
    public interface Hand

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static int BUST_SCORE
      A constant used to determine the maximum score of a hand

    • Field Detail

      • BUST_SCORE

        static final int BUST_SCORE
        A constant used to determine the maximum score of a hand
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • dealCard

        boolean dealCard​(Card card)
        The supplied Card is dealt to hand.

        If, when added to the hand, the total score for all cards does not exceed BUST_SCORE then the card is added to the hand and the method returns true. Otherwise the method returns false.

        Parameters:
        card - to be added (or rejected) to the hand
        Returns:
        true if the card was added; otherwise false.

      • isEmpty

        boolean isEmpty()
        Returns true if the hand contains no cards; i.e. if it is empty
        Returns:
        true if the hand contains no cards; otherwise false

      • getNumberOfCards

        int getNumberOfCards()
        Returns the number of cards currently held by the hand. Returns 0 if the hand is empty.
        Returns:
        the number of cards currently held by the hand

      • getScore

        int getScore()
        Returns the total score based on the Rank of every card currently held in the hand. Returns 0 if the hand is empty.
        Returns:
        the total score of the hand
        See Also:
        Rank

      • getSuitCount

        int getSuitCount​(Suit suit)
        Returns the total number of cards in the hand of the specified Suit

        If there are no cards in the hand whose suit matches that of the supplied parameter the method shall return 0. It should also return 0 if the supplied parameter is null.

        Parameters:
        suit - the suit for which to count the number of cards in the hand
        Returns:
        the total number of cards in the hand of the specified Suit

      • getCards

        java.util.Collection<Card> getCards()
        Returns an unmodifiable collection (shallow copy) of all cards currently in the hand
        Returns:
        an unmodifiable collection of all the cards currently in the hand

      • reset

        void reset()
        Resets the hand, removing all cards and any associated score

      • toString

        java.lang.String toString()
        Override Object.toString(). Generates a string representing the hand as seen in the output trace. The following are examples of such strings.
        • Empty Hand
        • Hand of 1 cards [2 of Clubs] Score: 2
        • Hand of 2 cards [2 of Clubs, 7 of Diamonds] Score: 9
        • Hand of 4 cards [Ace of Clubs, 4 of Diamonds, Queen of Clubs, Ace of Diamonds] Score: 16
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        a string representing the hand as seen in the output trace
